reviewText: This was filmed outside of Yunyang, Yunnan Province.  It took place in a beautiful terraced field over 2000 years old.  We were part of this film, the unnamed tourists, four of us from United States and one translator. Dave and Pauline

Nice and clean story.  Very much like the typical Chinese movies I watched when I was a kid in China decades ago!!!

Beautiful scenery.  A must for the whole family.  The photography is beautiful and properly exposed.  A very good production.
